title: What is the Rome tennis schedule?

Several other Italians will also be featured, including Matteo Arnaldi, #NextGenATP Federico Cina and a clash between Luca Nardi and Flavio Cobolli. Rome

Home favourites Arnaldi, Cobolli, Fognini to compete on Thursday

May 07, 2025

Getty Images

The Internazionali BNL d'Italia runs from 7-18 May. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continues on Thursday, when home favourite and Tour veteran Fabio Fognini begins his final outing at the ATP Masters 1000 event. Several other Italians will also be featured, including Matteo Arnaldi, #NextGenATP Federico Cina and a clash between Luca Nardi and Flavio Cobolli.

ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 08 MAY 2025
Campo Centrale - start 11:00
ATP - Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) vs Roberto Bautista Agut (ESP)

Not Before 13:00
WTA - Elisabetta Cocciaretto (ITA) vs [2] Iga Swiatek (POL)
WTA - [6] Jasmine Paolini (ITA) vs Lulu Sun (NZL)

Not Before 19:00
ATP - Jacob Fearnley (GBR) vs [WC] Fabio Fognini (ITA)

Not Before 20:30
WTA - Lucia Bronzetti (ITA) vs [12] Karolina Muchova (CZE)

Grand Stand Arena - start 11:00
WTA - Naomi Osaka (JPN) vs [9] Paula Badosa (ESP)
ATP - Mariano Navone (ARG) vs [WC] Federico Cina (ITA)
ATP - [WC] Luca Nardi (ITA) vs Flavio Cobolli (ITA)

Not Before 17:00
WTA - Ashlyn Krueger (USA) vs [3] Jessica Pegula (USA)
ATP - Mattia Bellucci (ITA) vs Pedro Martinez (ESP)

SuperTennis Arena - start 11:00
WTA - Petra Kvitova (CZE) vs [27] Ons Jabeur (TUN)
ATP - Fabian Marozsan (HUN) vs Joao Fonseca (BRA)
ATP - Arthur Rinderknech (FRA) vs [WC] Matteo Gigante (ITA)
WTA - [16] Elina Svitolina (UKR) vs Jessica Bouzas Maneiro (ESP)
ATP - Learner Tien (USA) vs Reilly Opelka (USA)

Pietrangeli - start 11:00
ATP - Hugo Gaston (FRA) vs Nicolas Jarry (CHI)
WTA - Peyton Stearns (USA) vs [28] Anna Kalinskaya
WTA - [29] Danielle Collins (USA) vs Elena-Gabriela Ruse (ROU)
ATP - Alexander Bublik (KAZ) vs Roman Safiullin
WTA - [5] Madison Keys (USA) vs TBD

Court 14 - start 11:00
ATP - Aleksandar Vukic (AUS) vs [Q] Nicolas Moreno De Alboran (USA)
WTA - [25] Elise Mertens (BEL) vs Suzan Lamens (NED)
WTA - Hailey Baptiste (USA) vs [19] Liudmila Samsonova
ATP - Roberto Carballes Baena (ESP) vs [Q] Sebastian Ofner (AUT)
WTA - [18] Beatriz Haddad Maia (BRA) vs Marie Bouzkova (CZE)

Court 1 - start 11:00
WTA - Jaqueline Cristian (ROU) vs [23] Yulia Putintseva (KAZ)
WTA - [13] Diana Shnaider vs Caroline Dolehide (USA)
ATP - Nuno Borges (POR) vs [Q] Thiago Seyboth Wild (BRA)
ATP - Gabriel Diallo (CAN) vs Marcos Giron (USA)

Court 2 - start 11:00
ATP - [LL] Jesper de Jong (NED) vs [Q] Alexander Shevchenko (KAZ)
WTA - [17] Jelena Ostapenko (LAT) vs Rebecca Sramkova (SVK)
ATP - [Q] Tomas Barrios Vera (CHI) vs Jaume Munar (ESP)
